[Introduction]
After defeating Shub-Niggurath, you arrive back at your home base on Earth, but it's not all blue skies and butterflies. Apparently, not all QUAKE forces have been subdued. Chaos ensues as you blast your way through the QUAKE minions and toward the infested gateway. Your only choice is to find the source of evil and shut it down. Without any hesitation, and with more guts than common sense, you leap into a portal of unknown destination. Rage through the various levels of pure action and maybe find some secret rooms. Resurrect the spirit of true first person shooters!

[Controls]
View: Left Click and Drag
Move: ARROW KEYS(holding SHIFT will speed your movement)
Switch weapons: NUMBER KEYS or /
Move left or right: A and D KEYS
Jump: SPACEBAR or Enter
Fire: CTRL

[About]
Developer: ID Software
